testcase.classname: Get the Total Number of Movies Count from the Provided API
testcase.name: Use the Provided API Endpoint and get the total number of movies count based on the movietitle
testcase.system-out: Given Build the API endpoint and verify the status code "maze"..............passed When Fetch the total movie count from the endpoint response "maze" and "97".passed And Fetch the total page count from the endpoint response "maze" and "10"...passed Then Validate the total movie counts "97"...................................passed And Validate the total page counts "10".....................................passed

testcase.classname: Get the Total Number of Movies Count from the Provided API
testcase.name: Use the Provided API Endpoint and get the total number of movies count based on the movietitle 2
testcase.system-out: Given Build the API endpoint and verify the status code "mazes".............passed When Fetch the total movie count from the endpoint response "mazes" and "0".passed And Fetch the total page count from the endpoint response "mazes" and "0"...passed Then Validate the total movie counts "0"....................................passed And Validate the total page counts "0"......................................passed
